location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 96 to Meer Ally Khan, Calantar [ Kalantaror Mayor] of Genowa [Bandar-e Ganaveh], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter gives thanks for steps taken for the recovery of property stolen from servants that were on board a vessel wrecked near Genowa [Bandar-e Ganaveh]. Other details of the situation are discussed and the return of the goods is demanded.
